title: Team USA Men's Basketball Has Tough Olympic Start, NBA Draft Preview
description:
Brian Windhorst, Marc J. Spears and Kevin Pelton discuss the unique setup for the Olympics in Tokyo, Team USA Men’s Basketball struggling out of the gate, what Luka can do in Tokyo and what to expect from the NBA Draft including impressive comparisons for Jalen Green.

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: What Does Team USA Need To Fix In The Olympics? NBA Draft Preview
